name: Jamy-Cactus
description:
shoot spines to remind your friends of who they truly are. Defeat the evil scientist and turn the lands back into the desert you knew.

Movement: WASD or Arrow keys
Jumping: Space
Shooting: Mouse and left click

This is my first game and also my first release. I created all the assets and did all the coding. I liked coding better.

Update 1.01

I added two additional files, that contain updated executables. In the hurry I overlooked two errors. One meant the game would crash after it was completed and the other was just a visual glitch in one of the maps.
